quest.name: The Crystal Knaves
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The battle-ready Mord's prey has led him to Ladle.

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: They will not escape me this time, oh no. Who? Criminals! They ignore Mord law and shame us all!

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: We must never take crystals from the Wall, for we believe that they can turn people into sin eaters. Even pieces that fall off are forbidden!

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: But those swindlers collect them, sell them! Of course, they do not tell their customers where the crystals come from, but I know their secret.

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: That is why I am here, to bring them to justice. Breaking our code, selling under false pretenses. Very serious crimes!

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: I have tracked them this far and they will soon be mine! But there are too many to catch by myself and I dare not risk failure. Stranger, will you lend me your aid?

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: I will circle around from the west of the palace while you approach from the east. Like the jaws of a zonure snapping shut! Take them alive if possible, but if they resist, show no mercy, for you will get none from them. When it's over, meet me back here.

dialogue.name: MOLDCRIMINALA03532
dialogue.text: SheHe's seen too much! Kill herhim!

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: Heh. I take it that's not your blood? The ones I caught also refused to come quietly. Well, what is done is done. They got what they deserved for spitting on our code!

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: Whether the Wall's crystals have anything to do with sin eaters is not for me to say. What I do know is that without rules, without law, we are no better than beasts. Beasts, I tell you!

dialogue.name: MOLDWARRIOR03532
dialogue.text: Ahem! Excuse me. Before we part ways, here is your reward for punishing the wicked.
